title: ComparativeEvidence: Mean difference in HbA1c between Surgery and Medical/Lifestyle groups in Ikramuddin 2013
citeAs: ComparativeEvidence: Mean difference in HbA1c between Surgery and Medical/Lifestyle groups in Ikramuddin 2013 [Evidence]. Contributors: Brian S. Alper [Authors/Creators]. In: Fast Evidence Interoperability Resources (FEvIR) Platform, FOI 47751. Revised 2022-05-29. Available at: https://fevir.net/resources/Evidence/47751. Computable resource at: https://fevir.net/resources/Evidence/47751.

targetAttachment.title: Figure 2C Metabolic Surgery in the Treatment Algorithm for Type 2 Diabetes: A Joint Statement by International Diabetes Organizations [Journal Article]. Contributors: Francesco Rubino, David M Nathan, Robert H Eckel, Philip R Schauer, K George M M Alberti, Paul Z Zimmet, Stefano Del Prato, Linong Ji, Shaukat M Sadikot, William H Herman, Stephanie A Amiel, Lee M Kaplan, Gaspar Taroncher-Oldenburg, David E Cummings, Delegates of the 2nd Diabetes Surgery Summit. In: Diabetes care, PMID 27222544. Published June 2016. Available at: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27222544/.

note.text: Mean HbA1c at 12 months in Ikramuddin 2013 was 6.3 % in Surgery group (n = 57) and 7.8% in Medical/Lifestyle group (n = 57)

description: Mean HbA1c at 12 months in Ikramuddin 2013 was 6.3 % in Surgery group (n = 57) and 7.8% in Medical/Lifestyle group (n = 19), mean difference -1.50% (95% CI -1.95% to -1.05%)

variableDefinition.description: 114 patients with T2DM and BMI 30 to 39.9 and HbA1c >= 8.0

observed.display: GroupAssignment: Roux-en-Y gastric bypass surgery vs. Lifestyle-intensive medical management intervention alone

variableDefinition.description: Roux-en-Y Gastric Bypass vs. medical treatment (Lifestyle-intensive medical management intervention LS/IMM)
variableDefinition.comparatorCategory: Lifestyle-intensive medical management intervention based on the Diabetes Prevention Program and LookAHEAD trials for 2 years

name: ComparativeEvidence_Mean_difference_in_HbA1c_between_Surgery_and_Medical_Lifestyle_groups_in_Ikramuddin_2013
